plot: Jake gets a letter from a lady cop. She tells him that there's a guy she's interested in but doesn't notice her. So she decides to take the initiative by arresting and taking him somewhere and cuffing him and telling him how she feels.
title: "Red Shoe Diaries" You Have the Right to Remain Silent
plot_es: Jake gets a letter from a lady cop. She tells him that there's a guy she's interested in but doesn't notice her. So she decides to take the initiative by arresting and taking him somewhere and cuffing him and telling him how she feels.
original_name: "Red Shoe Diaries" You Have the Right to Remain Silent
